Title: Allows parents, legal guardians, or school districts to opt children with an individualized education program out of the "common core standards" and certain testing
Summary: Allows parents, legal guardians or school districts to opt children with an individualized education program out of the "common core standards" and certain testing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing school districts to opt children with an individualized education program out of the "common core standards" and certain testing
